attributes.action: Terrorists families to pay for their crimes
attributes.additional_details: Their actions leave behind a lot of families suffering grief for what they do so it is only fair that their actions have consequences and their families should serve the penalty that they would have if they were caught in the act of terrorism they may think twice if there loved ones will suffer from their actions
attributes.background: There is no deterrent for a terrorist that is prepared to kill themselves for what they believe in their families should pay for the suffering caused to their victims families

rejection.details: It's not clear how someone could be required to serve a sentence for a crime they didn't commit.
